question: one of computer's CPU fan stopped  while working, suddenly due to overheating bad burning smell came from that. After few days i got it repaired but still i am getting the same smell. After a couple of days i realised that the burning smell is coming from my nose. i am feeling that it is very strong burning odour and feel very embarassed to join friends.is it related to any infection. diabetes or any cancer or else.i am worried now and may lead to some mental dissatisfaction if it continues for long.please suggest a fast remedy or guide me about wat it is????
title: burning smell from nose while breathing
